ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Not(CONTAINS(knowlarity_cti__Call_Disposition__c , 'Not Eligible')),Not(CONTAINS( knowlarity_cti__Call_Disposition__c , 'Cold')),Not(CONTAINS( knowlarity_cti__Call_Disposition__c , 'Warm')),Not(CONTAINS( knowlarity_cti__Call_Disposition__c , 'Hot')), Not(CONTAINS( knowlarity_cti__Call_Disposition__c , 'No Response')),Not(CONTAINS( knowlarity_cti__Call_Disposition__c , 'Invalid')),Not(CONTAINS( knowlarity_cti__Call_Disposition__c , 'Enrolled')),Not(CONTAINS( knowlarity_cti__Call_Disposition__c , 'Course Closed')), Not(CONTAINS( knowlarity_cti__Call_Disposition__c , 'Not Interested')),Not(CONTAINS( knowlarity_cti__Call_Disposition__c , 'Filled Application with Other Credentials')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter one of the exact values from the following list: Not Eligible, Cold, Warm, Hot, No Response, Invalid, Enrolled, Course Closed, Not Interested, Filled Application with Other Credentials.
